body.p:
BANKING HOUSE OF JOSEPH A. PINER,
Newport, Ky., 15 March 1861
Gov Magoffin Esq., Cash.,
Dear Sir:

I have been intimately acquainted with Joseph Temple for near twenty years has done a great deal of business with me I have always found him Honest and Honorable he is a vry old man now in his dotake his mind is very much impaired from what it was when I first knew ^him^ he has a Large and respectable Family it is the general desire of all who know him that he should be pardoned
